job_history.work_description: Program Manager that drove and finalized a major project initiative consisting of migrating 13,000 Exchange On-Premise mail users/accounts to cloud based services (Office 365). Program Manager responsible for implementation and management of systems that allow Asset/Lease Reporting, Enterprise Backup, Patch Management and Application Distribution to over 10,000 PC's globally utilizing cloud based solutions.
Developed long and short-term technology Server and Storage plans, formulated policies and procedures, and provided technology presentations to diverse groups of internal customers.
Provided support for NT, Netware, Macintosh, Cisco, 3Com, and Bay networks.
Responsible for troubleshooting, identifying, and resolving end user hardware and application issues.

skills.name: Cloud Computing
skills.explanation: Successfully managed a major project initiative to migrate 13,000 Exchange On-Premise mail users/accounts to cloud-based services (Office 365), demonstrating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Program Manager for multiple projects, including a major initiative to migrate to cloud-based services, showing expert-level proficiency in project management.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Senior Information Technology Manager with over 15 years of experience, indicating expert-level mastery of IT management.

skills.name: Server Management
skills.explanation: Developed long and short-term technology Server plans, showing strong proficiency in server management.

skills.name: Storage Management
skills.explanation: Developed long and short-term technology Storage plans, showing strong proficiency in storage management.

skills.name: Network Support
skills.explanation: Provided support for multiple network systems, including NT, Netware, Macintosh, Cisco, 3Com, and Bay networks, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Troubleshooting
skills.explanation: Responsible for troubleshooting, identifying, and resolving end user hardware and application issues, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Senior-level positions with over 15 years of experience, indicating strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Provided technology presentations to diverse groups of internal customers, showing solid working proficiency in communication.
